regulation: The rules below define whether an order qualifies for a given coupon

description.title: Customize coupon message
description.helperText: Message to be used when the customer applies the coupon
description.label: Add message

promotionText.helperText: Message to use in the coupon description to the customer

usage.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of usage quantities from which the coupon will apply to the order

quantity_orders.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of order quantities from which the coupon will apply to the order

amount.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of amounts from which the coupon will apply to the order

amountCategory.subtitle: Allows defining a maximum or range of amounts, by category, from which the coupon will apply to the order

product.subtitle: Allows selecting the product or products that could be added to the order under a given coupon

category.subtitle: Allows defining one or more categories to which a given coupon can be applied

address.subtitle: Allows defining one or more locations to which a given coupon can be applied
